name: Computer Forensic Methods
description: Techniques for analyzing and recovering digital evidence from computers and storage devices.

cards.title: Disk Imaging and Evidence Preservation
cards.description: Creating forensic copies of digital storage devices while preserving integrity.
bulletpoints: Use tools like FTK Imager and dd for disk imaging
Ensure write-blocking to maintain evidence integrity
Verify hash values to confirm forensic accuracy
cards.summaryText: Image storage with write-blocking and hashes to preserve pristine evidence copies.

cards.title: Deleted File Recovery and Metadata Analysis
cards.description: Recovering deleted files and analyzing metadata for investigative leads.
bulletpoints: Use data carving techniques to extract lost information
Analyze file timestamps and access logs for forensic reconstruction
Identify hidden partitions and encrypted file containers
cards.summaryText: Combine carving and metadata analysis to resurrect deleted artifacts and context.
